revisionDesc.change: Converted to P5 and hand-tidied where necessary

div.head: Online image delivery
div.p: With funding from the Andrew W Mellon Foundation, DIAMM has built an extensive online image and metadata delivery system. For projects unable to deliver their images themselves via the internet, they may be delivered through the DIAMM portal, or the delivery mechanism may be adapted for use by another project via consultation with the Centre for Computing in the Humanities (CCH)
If you would like to enquire further about your requirements, or about a project that you are planning, please contact the Project Manager, Julia Craig-McFeely,
